statements: SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM sculptures ORDER BY creation_year DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, creation_year FROM sculptures WHERE materials='Marble';
SELECT artist_name, provenance FROM sculptures WHERE creation_year > 1900;
SELECT sculpture_id, sculpture_name, artist_name FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name LIKE '%Da Vinci%';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, creation_year FROM sculptures WHERE sculpture_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Michel%' ORDER BY creation_year DESC;
SELECT sculpture_id, sculpture_name, materials FROM sculptures WHERE materials IS NOT NULL;
SELECT artist_name, provenance FROM sculptures WHERE creation_year > 2000 ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT sculpture_name, creation_year FROM sculptures WHERE materials LIKE '%bronze%' AND provenance LIKE '%Italy%' ORDER BY creation_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sculpture;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM Sculpture ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_id, sculpture_name, artist_name FROM Sculpture WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT sculpture_id, creation_date FROM Sculpture WHERE creation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT sculpture_name, acquisition_date FROM Sculpture INNER JOIN Provenance ON Sculpture.sculpture_id = Provenance.sculpture_id;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, creation_date FROM Sculpture WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo Da Vinci'
SELECT sculpture_name, creation_date FROM Sculpture WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date DESC
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, creation_date, provenance_notes FROM Sculpture LEFT JOIN Provenance ON Sculpture.sculpture_id = Provenance.sculpture_id WHERE provenance_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM Sculpture ORDER BY artist_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(sculpture_id) AS total_sculptures, MONTH(creation_date) AS month_created FROM Sculpture GROUP BY MONTH(creation_date) ORDER BY month_created ASC
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_id, sculpture_name, artist_name FROM sculptures WHERE creation_year > 2000;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM sculptures WHERE sculpture_id = 3;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, creation_year FROM sculptures ORDER BY creation_year DESC;
SELECT collection_name, collection_description FROM collections;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, creation_year FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name = 'Michelangelo' ORDER BY creation_year DESC;

SELECT collection_name, count(sculpture_id) AS sculptures_count FROM collections LEFT JOIN provenance ON collections.collection_id = provenance.collection_id GROUP BY collection_name ORDER BY sculptures_count DESC;

SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, collection_name FROM sculptures INNER JOIN provenance ON sculptures.sculpture_id = provenance.sculpture_id INNER JOIN collections ON provenance.collection_id = collections.collection_id;
SELECT artist_name, SUM(creation_year) AS total_creation_years FROM sculptures GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT collection_name, provenance_details FROM collections INNER JOIN provenance ON collections.collection_id = provenance.collection_id WHERE provenance.sculpture_id IN (SELECT sculpture_id FROM sculptures WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci');
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT name, artist, year_created FROM sculptures ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM artists WHERE nationality='French';
SELECT id, name, location FROM collections WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT sculpture_id, current_owner, sale_date FROM provenance WHERE current_owner='Museum XYZ';
SELECT name, artist, year_created FROM sculptures;
SELECT id, name, nationality, birth_year, death_year FROM artists ORDER BY birth_year DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM collections WHERE location = 'Museum';
SELECT sculpture_id, previous_owner, current_owner, sale_date FROM provenance WHERE sale_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, name, artist, description FROM sculptures WHERE year_created >= 2000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, creation_year FROM Sculptures;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM Locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT artist_name, nationality, birth_year FROM Artists ORDER BY birth_year DESC;
SELECT collection_id, collection_name, description, creation_year FROM Collections WHERE creation_year > 2000;
SELECT sculpture_id, event_type, event_date, description FROM SculptureHistory WHERE event_type='Restoration' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, material FROM Sculptures WHERE creation_year > 1990
SELECT location_name, address, city, country FROM Locations WHERE city = 'Paris'
SELECT artist_name, birth_year, nationality FROM Artists WHERE nationality = 'French' ORDER BY birth_year DESC
SELECT collection_name, creation_year, description FROM Collections WHERE collection_name LIKE '%modern%'
SELECT event_type, event_date, description FROM SculptureHistory WHERE sculpture_id = 5 ORDER BY event_date DESC
